Package Model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Area
    This class holds the things that are present on one screen of the game.
    Arrow
    extends item, this is a possible drop from enemies and replenishes the player's stock of arrows.
    ArrowShot
    projectile object to help show arrow movement across the screen, including directionality
    Boss
    Class for the game boss
    BossAttack
    Projectile class for boss' attacks.
    BowShot
    Projectile object to be drawn on screen.
    buttonMaker
    Class to make buttons with specific mouse over effects and font/style
    Character
    Abstract class for characters that can move and do damage
    Door
    Provides the fields for a door object
    DPS
    fills fields specific to DPS type enemies
    DungeonEntrance
    Fills fields specific to dungeon entrance/exits
    Enemy
    Abstract class for enemies.
    Flier
    Extends the enemy class, this enemy can fly over obstacles.
    GameImages
    Single class to hold Images for all game objects, that way we can still access them without having to waste massive amounts of overhead creating them 60/second.
    GameMap
    Composed of a 4x4 array of Areas Initializes 1 of each Area in the correct spot on the map, has methods to access various game constants.
    GameModel
    The main model class for the game, has fields and methods to access and update them for all of the various parts of the model paradigm
    GameObject  
    GameResource
    Wrapper class providing static methods for writing and reading saveGame to file.
    Grass
    Grass extends the Obstacle class, this is a destroyable object, with collision until destroyed.
    Heart
    extends item, this is a possible enemy drop and restores player health.
    Item
    just a shell class to help differentiate loot items from regular game objects.
    Key
    Extends the item class and provides all of the fields for a key item
    Obstacle
    Abstract class for Obstacles, which are impassable object on the map
    Overlay
    provides fields to store where different parts of the HUD need to be drawn
    Player
    Class for the player character, stores things about him/her
    PlayerSwing
    Animation character for player sword swings, with directionality.
    Rock
    extends obstacle, this is a small, indestructible, collision causing obstacle.
    ShieldPillar
    Enemy class with the fields for the main boss' shield pillar
    SpeedBuff
    Loot item that increases the player's speed, provides the necessary fields
    Tank
    provides all of the fields necessary for a Tank enemy.
    Tree
    Extends obstacle, this is an indestructible, large, collision causing obstacle.
